data.text: @LeeFennema ..you make us blush, thank you Lee! 💙
@mycochick Thank you for your feedback, we will follow up your case in our DM correspondence. Thank you.

@mycochick We are very sorry about your lost luggage. In order to verify your case, we invite you (for privacy reasons) to send us file reference starting with BLQEN***** via DM. We thank you in advance for cooperation.
@elchunterwegs Thanks for this nice picture! We hope you had a pleasant flying experience on board with us ✈️

@PetraGuasti Dear Petra, we would like to inform you that on all Air Dolomiti flights the use of masks on board is currently mandatory. If you would like to report your flight experience, please enter the details on this "Remark" form: https://t.co/eGDKjA4h7e

👁️‍🗨️ Enjoy up to 15% off your next car rental with SIXT.

Starting today, this stunning region is even easier to get to! ✈️
We’ve just landed in Brindisi, the first of many touchdowns in wonderful Puglia ☀️

#AdAstra #Settimocielo #oncloudnine https://t.co/DkfzzsYP5s

urls.title: Kalmar: the Best Attractions| Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Let yourself be inspired by Kalmar, one of the oldest cities in Sweden: characteristic landscapes and medieval atmospheres to discover with Air Dolomiti flights.

data.text:
#SportDay

What's the best way to plan a sports trip? 🚲
On the #AirDolomitiBlog, we show you the best apps to install on your smartphone. Is your favourite missing from our list? Write it in the comments 😎
👉 https://t.co/dYoGlU3e4F https://t.co/cYvqXIHFzE
@micmol Happy to have had you on board with such a view!☀️🛫

A great way to discover interesting facts from around the world? In this issue of #SpazioItaliaMagazine we talk about the importance of ethical contracts in agriculture. You’ll find it’s packed with taste 🥜 in every sense!
You can already read it now 👉 https://t.co/v5zD9dfSpN https://t.co/RiUIMkFkF3

data.text:
Dive into Puglia’s hot-blooded regional capital for a day to remember!
Get down with the fishermen at the portside market before strolling the labyrinthine lanes of Bari Vecchia 💙
Puglia is waiting for you 👉 https://t.co/gAr94kss5f
#WeAreInPuglia

📸 Joe Vitone / @WeAreInPuglia https://t.co/FVr2rtprtH

We are donating 1,878 travel kits containing blankets, pillows and other accessories to the people in Ukraine.
Our employees have also been making various kinds of donations, including food, toiletries and medicine.
 
Our sincere thanks to everyone who has participated.
🙏 https://t.co/UonN1mP2xz

We have resumed our weekly flights from Kalmar to Frankfurt! 
More info 👉 https://t.co/vbGD9CyLL9 https://t.co/NtBUviWI4S

@TheBalazs Dear Balazs, we're sorry to hear about this feedback of our Business Class service. We'd like to do some checks in order to provide you with full assistance, please send us a DM with your flight details. Thank you very much.
@the_yung_teen 🛫🛫🛫
@the_yung_teen We hope your dreams come true, Terry! 😇

Our CEO, Steffen Harbarth, wanted to meet 🤝 our Flight Academy trainees for the first time. 
They talked about a variety of topics, but one clear ambition was shared by everyone: the hope of a future with wings! ✈️

#AdAstra #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/e15rF9VOHo

On the #AirDolomitiBlog, we pay tribute to an Italian flight #pioneer, who unfortunately had to deal with a lot of prejudice, but whose tenacity and #courage were an inspiration 👉 https://t.co/q3oEvEzafP https://t.co/gLuFvYp4kF

data.text:
Héléne Dutrieu was nicknamed "The Human Arrow". 
And not just because she was a formidable #pilot! 😎
Find out why on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/p5HeaJgwVY https://t.co/BjIQdM7TSp

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Arrow
entity.description: When presumed-dead billionaire playboy Oliver Queen returns home to Starling City after five years stranded on a remote island in the Pacific, he hides the changes the experience had on him, while secretly seeking reconciliation with his ex, Laurel. By day he picks up where he left off, playing the carefree philanderer he used to be, but at night he dons the alter ego of Arrow and works to right the wrongs of his family and restore the city to its former glory. Complicating his mission is Laurel's father, Detective Quentin Lance, who is determined to put the vigilante behind bars.

data.text: @maracuyawn Good morning Anna, we are sorry to see this unavailable page. May we ask what you were looking for on our website? Thank you!

#Tiramisù 🍮 one of the most famous Italian desserts in the world.
But how many of you have sampled the mouth-watering version by maître pâtissier Biasetto? When you fly with us, you can choose this Tiramisù which will literally have you on cloud nine! 
👉 https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam https://t.co/9p3AL6M7ev

@JMccalljm Dear Jamir,

we are very sorry for your negative experience.
We hope to have the chance to welcome you back soon on board.

Have a nice day!

Air Dolomiti Team
@_BeMac19 @LeeFennema March 2020, we will never forget it! But we have always tried to maintain high standards in our services, and your words give us even more motivation 💪😍 See you soon, Brian! ✈️

data.text: @AleNF104 Niente male questa storia d'amore, vero Alessandro? 😇 Buona giornata!
@the_yung_teen Thanks Terry, we will send them your wishes! ✨

💙 Today we’d like to introduce you to Marta and Diego.
They both work for Air Dolomiti and first met each other in 2009.

data.text:
💡 Are you looking for additional benefits for your business trip? 💼
We are introducing Lufthansa Group Corporate Value fares!
Travellers who are on corporate #rewards programmes will now fly with zero CO2 emissions 👉 https://t.co/nRU0Z82FSa

#AirDolomiti #LufthansaGroup https://t.co/2DaOwo2hmF

data.text:
New ways to be more environmentally friendly 🍃
From our offices to on board our flights, all of our printed materials carry the FSC label 📑 and we no longer use disposable plastic stirrers. We've replaced them with stirrers made from bamboo, a renewable material! ♻️ https://t.co/EW7DysAqR0
@psaviousa Thank you both and... enjoy the flight! 😍

📑 Over 750 web pages in 338 days.
🗣️ 3 languages, 7+ creative minds.

After much tinkering and tweaking, we're incredibly excited to announce that our new website is now online! 📲
We can't wait for you to check it out! 🚀🚀 https://t.co/eUsJnPdeJn https://t.co/aDsnf9sOJZ

urls.title: Flights to Italy and Germany: Discover Europe | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Fly to Germany and Italy with Air Dolomiti: discover all the connections and reach the main European destinations easily with our best fares.

data.text: @MrBolster @gioandminu We are really sorry to read this, could you please send us your reference number via private message?

Thanks to our special services, travel is now possible for everyone 🐾
Here's the extremely cute Minù 🐱 on board one of our flights, cosy in a cat carrier designed in our colours 💙
Discover services tailored to you 👉 https://t.co/vUxH7vwrgG

Ph. credits: @gioandminu https://t.co/5wT1h4qTUq

urls.title: Animals on board | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Do you need to take pets on board? Find out about the Air Dolomiti service and fly with your dog or cat.

data.text:

👉 https://t.co/my0VfFihPu https://t.co/Uu113eji6v

data.text:
If you're expecting to be served a basic sandwich when you fly with us, that's because you haven't yet experienced the menu of our #SpazioItaliaBar 😎
Dive into the world of our selected chefs and sample their mouth-watering creations  ✈️
Find out more 👉 https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam https://t.co/OnM7nsvumz

urls.title: Inflight service Settimocielo| Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Check out the on-board service offered on Air Dolomiti flights according to the fare you have purchased.

data.text:
@psaviousa Ermete is going to be one step ahead 🔝 choosing a quality with an Italian heart! 
Enjoy your stay 😇
@psaviousa Look who's back, one of our favourite frequent flyers: Mr Bear 😉 nice to see you on board with us again 💙 relax and enjoy!
@Air_Dolomiti Look who's back, one of our favourite frequent flyers: Mr Bear 😉 nice to see you on board with us again 💙 relax and enjoy!

📸 Are you dreaming of the perfect destination for your next trip?
Puglia combines art & culture with stunning beaches & crystal-clear waters 🌊
And from 9 April, you can also fly with us to Brindisi! ✈️
Book now 👉 https://t.co/5bIfm0zYEv https://t.co/13nnccVOVM

urls.title: Booking | Air Dolomiti

We'd like to ask you the permission to repost it on our feed, if you wish please send us a DM 😉

data.text: @SonDakikaGndem6 Thank you for sharing. Back in 2012 we cooperated with the authorities responsible for the investigations and arranged a flight back for some passengers. Overall, 58 passengers and 4 crew members were landed safely. Have a nice day ahead!

@AusterityAirli1 Thank you for sharing. Back in 2012 we cooperated with the authorities responsible for the investigations and arranged a flight back for some passengers. Overall, 58 passengers and 4 crew members were landed safely. Have a nice day ahead!

Although the festivities fly by, luckily the mountains are with us all year round 🏔️
And sometimes you just have to look at them (even from the window!) ☃️ to feel like you're still on holiday! 💙

#AirDolomiti ✈️ https://t.co/grczKshPBK

data.text:
Let’s wave goodbye to this holiday season - and to our holiday-themed headrest covers 🎄
The holidays might be a little different this year, but we still think this is the most magical time of the year ✨

Can't wait to welcome you on board your next flight with us! 😍
#AdAstra https://t.co/lsUoyfr2GG

Make the most of the festive season and set aside a bit of space in your case for wishes to be fulfilled in 2022 🎁 
💝 What are your #newyearsresolutions?

👇 👇 👇 https://t.co/bcyTl5C2Xo
@psaviousa Hi Piero, thank you so much!!! Happy new year!!!
